code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{addTodoAsync}from'../redux/todoSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTodoForm=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[dueDate,setDueDate]=useState('');const dispatch=useDispatch();const onSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();if(title&&dueDate){dispatch(addTodoAsync({title,dueDate}));setTitle('');setDueDate('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,className:"form-inline mt-3 mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group mb-2 mr-sm-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"todoTitle",className:"sr-only",children:"Todo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"todoTitle",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Add todo...",value:title,onChange:event=>setTitle(event.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group mb-2 mr-sm-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"todoDueDate",className:"sr-only",children:"Due Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",id:"todoDueDate",className:"form-control",value:dueDate,onChange:event=>setDueDate(event.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary mb-2",children:"Submit"})]});};export default AddTodoForm;
